item.Q:
Write the character:
to take care (of); to control; to manage; to be in charge of; to look after; to run; tube; pipe; surname Guan
item.A:
guǎn
管理 guǎnlǐ to supervise; to manage; to administer; management; administration

traditional: 網
wǎng
网点 (網點) wǎngdiǎn node in a network; branch; website

item.Q:
Write the character:
area; region; district; small; distinguish
item.A:
traditional: 區
qū
地区 (地區) dìqū area; region

item.Q:
Write the character:
a period of time; phase; stage; (used for issue of a periodical, courses of study); time; term; period; to hope
item.A:
qī
时期 (時期) shíqī a period in time or history; period; time (interval); phase

item.Q:
Write the character:
mistake; error; blunder; fault; cross; uneven; wrong
item.A:
traditional: 錯
cuò
错误 (錯誤) cuòwù error; mistake; mistaken

item.Q:
Write the character:
to negate; to deny; not
item.A:
fǒu
是否 shìfǒu whether (or not); if; is or isn't

item.Q:
Write the character:
happy; laugh; cheerful; surname Le
item.A:
traditional: 樂
lè
快乐 (快樂) kuàilè happy; merry

item.Q:
Write the character:
to enter; entering tone (classical Chinese)
item.A:
rù
进入 (進入) jìnrù to enter; to join; to go into

item.Q:
Write the character: zhǎo
(xúnzhǎo de zhǎo)
item.A:
to try to find; to look for; to call on sb; to find; to seek; to return; to look for; to give change
寻找 (尋找) xúnzhǎo to seek; to look for
bùguǎn no matter (what, how); regardless of; no matter
zhǔguǎn in charge (of a position etc); the person in charge; responsible

traditional: 別管
biéguǎn no matter (who, what etc)
zhǐguǎn solely engrossed in one thing; just (one thing, no need to worry about the rest); simply; by all means; please feel free; do not hesitate (to ask for sth)
shuǐguǎn water pipe
kānguǎn to look after

traditional: 科學管理
kēxuéguǎnlǐ scientific management
guǎnzi tube; pipe; drinking straw
guǎnjīa housekeeper; butler; manage one's household
guǎnjiào to discipline; to teach
guǎnlǐ to supervise; to manage; to administer; management; administration
guǎnyòng (adj) useful
guǎndào pipeline

traditional: 經管
jīngguǎn be in charge of

traditional: 電子管
diànzǐguǎn valve (electronics); vacuum tube

traditional: 球網
qiúwǎng net (for ball games)

traditional: 網球
wǎngqiú tennis

traditional: 網點
wǎngdiǎn node in a network; branch; website

traditional: 電網
diànwǎng power network

traditional: 區分
qūfēn to differentiate; to find differing aspects

traditional: 區區
qūqū trivial

traditional: 區間
qūjiān interval (math.)

traditional: 地區
dìqū area; region

traditional: 城區
chéngqū city district

traditional: 大區
dàqū area
zhōngqī mid-term
xiānqī early period
fēnqī by stages; staggered; step by step
dàoqī become due (e.g. loans)
qiánqī (n) the time period preceeding some other time
tóngqī the corresponding time period (e.g. compare inflation now with the rate during the same month last year)
rúqī as scheduled; on time; punctual

traditional: 學期
xuéqī term; semester
dìngqī regularly; at regular intervals
gōngqī work period

traditional: 後期
hòuqī late stage; later period
rìqī date

traditional: 時期
shíqī a period in time or history; period; time (interval); phase

traditional: 期間
qījiān period of time; time; time period; period

traditional: 為期
wéiqī (to be done) by (a certain date); lasting (a certain time)

traditional: 發情期
fāqíngqī the breeding season (zool.)

traditional: 過期
guòqī to be overdue; to exceed the time limit; expire (as in expiration date)

traditional: 長期
chángqī long term; long time

traditional: 不錯
bùcuò correct; right; not bad; pretty good
búcuò not bad

traditional: 交錯
jiāocuò to crisscross; to intertwine

traditional: 出錯
chūcuò error

traditional: 大錯
dàcuò blunder

traditional: 過錯
guòcuò mistake

traditional: 錯位
cuòwèi to misplace; displacement (e.g. of broken bones); out of alignment; faulty contact; erroneous judgment; inversion (medical, e.g. breach delivery)

traditional: 錯覺
cuòjiào illusiveness
cuòjué misconception

traditional: 錯過
cuòguò (to) miss bus, plane, train etc

traditional: 錯開
cuòkāi staggered
kěfǒu can or cannot
fǒudìng to negate; negative (answer)
shìfǒu whether (or not); if; is or isn't
néngfǒu can or cannot?

traditional: 作樂
zuòlè merrymaking

traditional: 樂天
lètiān sanguinity

traditional: 樂意
lèyì (v)be happy to do sth; (adj) happy; satisfied

traditional: 樂於
lèyú happy to the point of

traditional: 樂章
yuèzhāng movement (of a symphony)

traditional: 樂音
yuèyīn musical note; tone

traditional: 長樂
Chánglè (N) Changle (city in Fujian)

traditional: 入學
rùxué to enter a school or college; to go to school for the first time as a child
rùshǒu to begin; to set one's hand to

traditional: 入會
rùhuì affiliation
zàirù re-enters
chūrù (v) come and go; (n) discrepancy; inconsistancy
jīarù to become a member; to join; to mix into; to participate in; to add in

traditional: 沒入
méirù mergence

traditional: 進入
jìnrù to enter; to join; to go into
